verses.text: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto us, and \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* us; \add and\add* cause his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w shine|strong="H0215"\w* upon us; \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 67.1 \ft chiefâ€¦: or, overseer\f*\f + \fr 67.1 \ft upon: Heb. with\f*
That thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* may be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, thy saving \w health|strong="H3444"\w* among all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
Let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; let all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee.

O let the \w nations|strong="H3816"\w* be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* and sing for \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*: for thou shalt \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w righteously|strong="H4334"\w*, and \w govern|strong="H5148"\w* the \w nations|strong="H3816"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 67.4 \ft govern: Heb. lead\f*
Let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; let all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee.

\add Then\add* shall the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* her \w increase|strong="H2981"\w*; \add and\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add even\add* our own \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* us.
\w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* us; and all the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* him.
